subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It has been two and a half seasons since the Detroit Pistons fan John Green tossed his cup of beer at the Pacers’ Ron Artest, who then charged into the stands and instigated a brawl.
snippet: It has been two and a half seasons since the Detroit Pistons fan John Green tossed his cup of beer at the Pacers’ Ron Artest, who then charged into the stands and instigated a brawl.
